name: Airport Traffic Puzzle Air Plane support: The World Flight Path Strategy
name_original: Airport Traffic Puzzle Air Plane support: The World Flight Path Strategy
description:
The Craques Potes Family is FINALLY IN TOWN!!! For their first adventure of the series, it’s start with a freaking traffic jam into the airport … Itself … and yes they are still stuck into their plane. It’s time for you to help them to get out of there … in the game AIRPORT TRAFFIC PUZZLE AIR PLANE SUPPORT : THE WORLD FLIGHT PATH STRATEGY.

For that puzzle you will need to Guide the blue airplane out of the traffic. To succeed well, you will need strategy. Also, try to get the plane out with the less shots! So let's see how smart you are to solve all the levels!

Time to concentrate for hours, and of course ... hours of fun!!

Features:

- Outstanding backgrounds : Atlanta, Beijing and many more airport!
- Every levels are challenges to solve out, You can’t wait to clear them ALL!

--------------------------------

How to play?

- Move every planes into the game to make the main airplane to reach his target with the less shots!!

We propose you a great tutorial into the game itself.

Follow The Craques Potes Family over their adventures !! You can’t wait to see them in real!

Any suggestions and/or feedbacks?
Reach The Craques Potes Family at: family@craquespotes.com
